sentences.sContent: We also made some radiometric measurements to derive a more precise orbit.
sentences.sContent_eng: We also made some radiometric measurements to derive a more precise orbit.
sentences.sCn: 我们还通过辐射测量的方法矫正了轨道，使之更加精确。

sentences.sContent: We also made some radiometric measurements to derive a more precise orbit. This should make it easier to contact Phobos-Grunt in future.
sentences.sContent_eng: We also made some radiometric measurements to derive a more precise orbit. This should make it easier to contact Phobos-Grunt in future.
sentences.sCn: 我们还通过辐射测量的方法矫正了轨道，使之更加精确。这有利于我们未来更加容易地与探测器取得联系。

phrases.pCn: 放射性定年法；同位素年龄测定

trans.tranCn: 辐射测量的,  辐射度的
